title: Designer’s Dream Sectional Sofa [Gems From The Nashville Craigslist]
author: Morgan Levy

contentEncoded:
We posted this gem of a Craigslist ad yesterday on Twitter (via @winstonavich) and it was quite popular, though we’re not sure that our readers are really in the market for a custom sofa that is allegedly worth $25,000 (especially when it looks like this):

Designer’s Dream Sectional Sofa – $1500 (Franklin/Cool Springs)

6 cushion ‘Play Pen’ sectional sofa with 2 ottomans which fill center open space (not shown). Vintage custom made duck/goose down. HUGE…139″ end to end. 68″ front to back. 28″ tall and 30″ seats. Was $25,000 new! Invest $1500 and some reupholstery and re-sell for $15,000. It’s THAT fabulous
